response.explain: The previous action code has successfully executed the subtask of grasping the chocolates. The robot now has the chocolates in its inventory. The next step is to put the chocolates into the shopping cart.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take out the chocolates from the fridge
(4) Move to the chocolates
(5) Grasp the chocolates
(6) Put the chocolates into the shopping cart
(7) Move to the checkout counter
(8) Checkout the chocolates
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 6: Put the chocolates into the shopping cart
    shopping_cart = registry(env,"shopping_cart_kmgltg_1")
    chocolates = registry(env,"chocolates_177")
    put_inside(robot, chocolates, shopping_cart)
    donothing(env)
